sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; /** * BannersTab Component * Manages promotional banners and site-wide announcements * Props: * - banners: array of promotional banners * - showBannerForm: boolean to show/hide form * - editingBanner: currently editing banner object or null * - bannerFormData: form data object * - onFormDataChange: function to update form data * - onShowForm: function to show form * - onHideForm: function to hide form * - onSubmitBanner: function to submit banner (create/update) * - onEditBanner: function to start editing a banner * - onDeleteBanner: function to delete a banner * - onToggleStatus: function to toggle banner active/inactive status */ function BannersTab({ banners, showBannerForm, editingBanner, bannerFormData, onFormDataChange, onShowForm, onHideForm, onSubmitBanner, onEditBanner, onDeleteBanner, onToggleStatus }) { // Helper function to get status badge const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const statusMap = { active: { icon: '‚úÖ', text: 'Active', class: 'status-active' }, inactive: { icon: '‚è∏Ô∏è', text: 'Inactive', class: 'status-inactive' }, scheduled: { icon: 'üìÖ', text: 'Scheduled', class: 'status-scheduled' }, expired: { icon: '‚è∞', text: 'Expired', class: 'status-expired' } }; return statusMap[status] || statusMap.inactive; }; return (

üéûÔ∏è Promotional Banners

{/* Banner Creation/Edit Form */} {showBannerForm && (

{editingBanner ? 'Edit Banner' : 'Create New Banner'}

{/* Title Input */}
onFormDataChange('title', e.target.value)} placeholder="e.g. Summer Sale 2024" required />
{/* Subtitle Input */}
onFormDataChange('subtitle', e.target.value)} placeholder="e.g. Up to 70% OFF on Fashion" required />
{/* Color Inputs */}
onFormDataChange('backgroundColor', e.target.value)} />
onFormDataChange('textColor', e.target.value)} />
{/* Button Configuration */}
onFormDataChange('buttonText', e.target.value)} placeholder="e.g. Shop Now" />
onFormDataChange('buttonLink', e.target.value)} placeholder="e.g. /products/fashion" />
{/* Position and Status */}
onFormDataChange('priority', parseInt(e.target.value))} />
{/* Date Range */}
onFormDataChange('startDate', e.target.value)} placeholder="e.g. 01 May 2024" />
onFormDataChange('endDate', e.target.value)} placeholder="e.g. 31 May 2024" />
{/* Banner Preview */}

Preview:

{bannerFormData.title || 'Banner Title'}

{bannerFormData.subtitle || 'Banner subtitle'}

{/* Form Actions */}
)} {/* Banners List */}
{banners.length === 0 ? (
üéûÔ∏è

No Banners

Create your first promotional banner to get started.

) : (
{banners.map(banner => { const statusInfo = getStatusBadge(banner.status); return (
{/* Banner Preview */}

{banner.title}

{banner.subtitle}

{/* Banner Info */}
{statusInfo.icon} {statusInfo.text} üìç {banner.position}
üìÖ {banner.startDate} - {banner.endDate}
üëÅÔ∏è {banner.impressions.toLocaleString()} views üñ±Ô∏è {banner.clicks.toLocaleString()} clicks {banner.clicks > 0 && ( üìä {((banner.clicks / banner.impressions) * 100).toFixed(2)}% CTR )}
{/* Banner Actions */}
); })}
)}
); } export default BannersTab;
